text: @paulsperry_ @realDonaldTrump Who is the PC Coronavirus Police?  I know of the CDC, the WHO...the White House Opening Up America Again plans... No one seems to be listening to those.  Europe did. China did. They are open and done. Us not so much.  America is not safe because POTUS will not set an example.
